File /std/basic/surface.c

This file contains the methods to handle surfaces, like book shelves and stuff.

See also:
/std/shadows/misc/surface.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/surface.h

Method index

check_environment()
This method checks to make sure the environment has a shadow associated with it.
check_shadows()
This method checks to make sure all the shadows are currenly valid.
make_shadow(object)
This method makes a surface shadow which is attached to the given object.
query_surface_shadows()
This method returns the current set of surface shadows associated with the object.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
check_environment
void check_environment()
This method checks to make sure the environment has a shadow associated with it.

See also:
check_shadows()
check_shadows
void check_shadows()
This method checks to make sure all the shadows are currenly valid. If an invalid shadow is found it is removed.

The method check_environment() is called at the end of the function.

See also:
check_environment()
make_shadow
void make_shadow(object thing)
This method makes a surface shadow which is attached to the given object.

Parameters:
thing - the object to attach the shadow too
query_surface_shadows
object * query_surface_shadows()
This method returns the current set of surface shadows associated with the object.

Returns:
the current set of surface shadows
See also:
make_shadow() and check_shadows()
